text: Novosphingobium rhizosphaerae is a Gram-negative, non-spore-forming and rod- shaped bacterium from the genus of Novosphingobium which has been isolated from the rhizosphere of the plant Zea mays in Tallassee in the United States. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Novosphingobium rhizosphaerae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2015 Category:Sphingomonadales
title: Novosphingobium rhizosphaerae
